item.name: Ajani Goldmane
item.text: +1: You gain 2 life. -1: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn. -6: Put a white Avatar creature token onto the battlefield. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to your life total."

item.name: Ajani's Mantra
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: "He hasn't returned to the Cloud Forest. But I can still sense his calming presence." —Zaliki of Naya

item.name: Ajani's Pridemate
item.text: Whenever you gain life, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate. (For example, if an effect causes you to gain 3 life, you may put one +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
item.flavorText: "When one of us prospers, the pride prospers." —Jazal Goldmane

item.name: Angelic Arbiter
item.text: Flying Each opponent who cast a spell this turn can't attack with creatures. Each opponent who attacked with a creature this turn can't cast spells.

item.name: Armored Ascension
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Plains you control and has flying.
item.flavorText: With skill and strength honed upon the prairie, Naxtil won his battles high above it.

item.name: Assault Griffin
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: "Fine soldiers guarded the northern front. They waited for two-legged foes and left the skies unheeded." —General Avitora

item.name: Baneslayer Angel
item.text: Flying, first strike, lifelink, protection from Demons and from Dragons
item.flavorText: Some angels protect the meek and innocent. Others seek out and smite evil wherever it lurks.

item.name: Blinding Mage
item.text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
item.flavorText: "I carry the light of truth. Do not pity those it blinds, for they never had eyes to see."

item.name: Celestial Purge
item.text: Exile target black or red permanent.
item.flavorText: "They say only the good die young. Obviously, you are one of the exceptions." —Delrobah, cleric of Ivora Gate

item.name: Cloud Crusader
item.text: Flying First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
item.flavorText: Each crusader bonds with a griffin fledgling while still a child, and the two grow up as siblings.

item.name: Condemn
item.text: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.
item.flavorText: "No doubt the arbiters would put you away, after all the documents are signed. But I will have justice now." —Alovnek, Boros guildmage

item.name: Day of Judgment
item.text: Destroy all creatures.

item.name: Elite Vanguard
item.flavorText: The vanguard is skilled at waging war alone. The enemy is often defeated before its reinforcements reach the front.

item.name: Excommunicate
item.text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
item.flavorText: "Our law prohibits capital punishment. We believe even the gravest offenders have the chance to redeem themselves." —Torian Sha, soul warden

item.name: Goldenglow Moth
item.text: Flying Whenever Goldenglow Moth blocks, you may gain 4 life.
item.flavorText: "Little moth, fluttering bright, What luck will you bring tonight?" —Benalish children's rhyme

item.name: Holy Strength
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.
item.flavorText: "Born under the sun, the first child will seek the foundation of honor and be fortified by its righteousness." —Codex of the Constellari

item.name: Honor of the Pure
item.text: White creatures you control get +1/+1.
item.flavorText: Together the soldiers were like a golden blade, cutting down their enemies and scarring the darkness.

item.name: Infantry Veteran
item.text: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Any fool can pick up a sword and charge into battle. To emerge alive at the end, that is a gift that comes from leadership and experience."

item.name: Inspired Charge
item.text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Impossible! How could they overwhelm us? We had barricades, war elephants, . . . and they were barely a tenth of our number!" —General Avitora

item.name: Knight Exemplar
item.text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Other Knight creatures you control get +1/+1 and are indestructible. (Lethal damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

item.name: Leyline of Sanctity
item.text: If Leyline of Sanctity is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.

item.name: Mighty Leap
item.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The southern fortress taken by invaders? Heh, sure . . . when elephants fly." —Brezard Skeinbow, captain of the guard

item.name: Pacifism
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
item.flavorText: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

item.name: Palace Guard
item.text: Palace Guard can block any number of creatures.
item.flavorText: "I'm not nearly as bothered by being outnumbered as I am by their foul stench."

item.name: Roc Egg
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) When Roc Egg is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a 3/3 white Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

item.name: Safe Passage
item.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn.
item.flavorText: With one flap of her wings, the angel beat back the fires of war.

item.name: Serra Angel
item.text: Flying Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
item.flavorText: Perfect justice in service of a perfect will.

item.name: Serra Ascendant
item.text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.) As long as you have 30 or more life, Serra Ascendant gets +5/+5 and has flying.

item.name: Siege Mastodon
item.flavorText: "The walls of the wicked will fall before us. Ready the siege engines. We proceed to war!" —General Avitora

item.name: Silence
item.text: Your opponents can't cast spells this turn. (Spells cast before this resolves are unaffected.)
item.flavorText: "Take a quiet moment to reflect on your sins." —Cleph, Order of Redeemed Souls

item.name: Silvercoat Lion
item.flavorText: "In the wild, white fur like mine is an aberration. We lack natural camouflage, but the inability to hide encourages other strengths." —Ajani Goldmane

item.name: Solemn Offering
item.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.
item.flavorText: "A relic donation is suggested." "The suggestion is mandatory." —Temple signs

item.name: Squadron Hawk
item.text: Flying When Squadron Hawk enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Squadron Hawk, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

item.name: Stormfront Pegasus
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: "At summer's end, the pegasus herd stampedes across the sky. Their silent footfalls taunt the clouds and bid the rains to come." —Stormfront fable

item.name: Sun Titan
item.text: Vigilance Whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
item.flavorText: A blazing sun that never sets.

item.name: Tireless Missionaries
item.text: When Tireless Missionaries enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
item.flavorText: If they succeed in their holy work, their order will vanish into welcome obscurity, for there will be no more souls to redeem.

item.name: Vengeful Archon
item.text: Flying {X}: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to you this turn. If damage is prevented this way, Vengeful Archon deals that much damage to target player.

item.name: War Priest of Thune
item.text: When War Priest of Thune enters the battlefield, you may destroy target enchantment.
item.flavorText: "Let nothing take away from the purity of swords clashing or of arrows taking flight toward the breast of evil."

item.name: White Knight
item.text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)

item.name: Wild Griffin
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: Farmers typically keep their flocks at thirteen sheep—one to distract the griffins while they take the other twelve to market.

item.name: Æther Adept
item.text: When Æther Adept enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: Some mages do their best work in solitude. Others do their best work creating it.

item.name: Air Servant
item.text: Flying {2}{U}: Tap target creature with flying.
item.flavorText: "Wind is forceful, yet ephemeral. It can knock a dragon out of the sky, yet pass through the smallest crack unhindered." —Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity

item.name: Alluring Siren
item.text: {T}: Target creature an opponent controls attacks you this turn if able.
item.flavorText: "The ground polluted floats with human gore, And human carnage taints the dreadful shore Fly swift the dangerous coast: let every ear Be stopp'd against the song! 'tis death to hear!" —Homer, The Odyssey, trans. Pope

item.name: Armored Cancrix
item.flavorText: Creatures displaced from time still turn up every year, stranded by the temporal disaster that once swept across Dominaria.

item.name: Augury Owl
item.text: Flying When Augury Owl enters the battlefield, scry 3. (To scry 3, look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

item.name: Azure Drake
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: More so than "storm" or "pirate," "drake" is the word a sailor least wants to hear.

item.name: Call to Mind
item.text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: "It's hard to say which is more satisfying: the search for that missing piece or fitting that piece into place." —Evo Ragus

item.name: Cancel
item.text: Counter target spell.

item.name: Clone
item.text: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: The shapeshifter mimics with a twin's esteem and a mirror's cruelty.

item.name: Cloud Elemental
item.text: Flying Cloud Elemental can block only creatures with flying.
item.flavorText: "The sky teems with just as much life as the forest or the deep seas." —Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

item.name: Conundrum Sphinx
item.text: Flying Whenever Conundrum Sphinx attacks, each player names a card. Then each player reveals the top card of his or her library. If the card a player revealed is the card he or she named, that player puts it into his or her hand. If it's not, that player puts it on the bottom of his or her library.

item.name: Diminish
item.text: Target creature becomes 1/1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "‘That was a narrow escape!' said Alice, a good deal frightened at the sudden change, but very glad to find herself still in existence." —Lewis Carroll, Alice's Adventures in Wonderland

item.name: Flashfreeze
item.text: Counter target red or green spell.
item.flavorText: "Your downfall was not your ignorance, your weakness, or your hubris, but your warm blood." —Heidar, Rimewind master

item.name: Foresee
item.text: Scry 4, then draw two cards. (To scry 4, look at the top four cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
item.flavorText: Two eyes to see what could be, two eyes to see what will.

item.name: Frost Titan
item.text: Whenever Frost Titan becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless its controller pays {2}. Whenever Frost Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, tap target permanent. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

item.name: Harbor Serpent
item.text: Islandwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls an Island.) Harbor Serpent can't attack unless there are five or more Islands on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Like most giant monsters villagers worship as gods, it proves a fickle master.

item.name: Ice Cage
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, destroy Ice Cage.

item.name: Jace Beleren
item.text: +2: Each player draws a card. -1: Target player draws a card. -10: Target player puts the top twenty cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

item.name: Jace's Erasure
item.text: Whenever you draw a card, you may have target player put the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
item.flavorText: "You should try to clear your mind of idle thoughts. And if you can't, I will."

item.name: Jace's Ingenuity
item.text: Draw three cards.
item.flavorText: "Brute force can sometimes kick down a locked door, but knowledge is a skeleton key."

item.name: Leyline of Anticipation
item.text: If Leyline of Anticipation is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. You may cast nonland cards as though they had flash. (You may cast them any time you could cast an instant.)

item.name: Mana Leak
item.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
item.flavorText: The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy.

item.name: Maritime Guard
item.flavorText: Once common in the Kapsho Seas, merfolk were hunted almost to extinction. They survived those dark days and emerged calculating and determined to endure.

item.name: Mass Polymorph
item.text: Exile all creatures you control, then reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal that many creature cards. Put all creature cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your library.

item.name: Merfolk Sovereign
item.text: Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Target Merfolk creature is unblockable this turn.
item.flavorText: "Be like the sea: flow around that which is unmovable; for everything else, crash into it unrelentingly."

item.name: Merfolk Spy
item.text: Islandwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls an Island.) Whenever Merfolk Spy deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals a card at random from his or her hand.

item.name: Mind Control
item.text: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature.
item.flavorText: "The mind: a great weapon and an even greater weakness." —Jace Beleren

item.name: Negate
item.text: Counter target noncreature spell.
item.flavorText: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.

item.name: Phantom Beast
item.text: When Phantom Beast becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
item.flavorText: As insubstantial as fear, and as dangerous.

item.name: Preordain
item.text: Scry 2, then draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

item.name: Redirect
item.text: You may choose new targets for target spell.
item.flavorText: "Your strategy is marvelous. I've just made a few minor adjustments." —Veris, watcher of Indi Keep

item.name: Scroll Thief
item.text: Whenever Scroll Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
item.flavorText: I've learned how to disable wards, pick locks, and decode the Agaran language—all before even reading the scroll!

item.name: Sleep
item.text: Tap all creatures target player controls. Those creatures don't untap during that player's next untap step.
item.flavorText: "I give them dreams so wondrous that they hesitate to return to the world of the conscious." —Garild, merfolk mage

item.name: Stormtide Leviathan
item.text: Islandwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls an Island.) All lands are Islands in addition to their other types. Creatures without flying or islandwalk can't attack.

item.name: Time Reversal
item.text: Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library, then draws seven cards. Exile Time Reversal.
item.flavorText: "Optimists see the world as they wish it to be. Pessimists see the world as it is. Must these roles be mutually exclusive?" —Evo Ragus

item.name: Tome Scour
item.text: Target player puts the top five cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
item.flavorText: Genius is overrated, especially when it's someone else's.

item.name: Traumatize
item.text: Target player puts the top half of his or her library, rounded down, into his or her graveyard.
item.flavorText: He was left with just enough memory to understand what he had lost.

item.name: Unsummon
item.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "You're trespassing in my reality. Ask permission next time." —Simun the Quiet

item.name: Wall of Frost
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Whenever Wall of Frost blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
item.flavorText: "I welcome it. The pasture is cleared of weeds and the wolves are frozen solid." —Lumi, goatherd

item.name: Water Servant
item.text: {U}: Water Servant gets +1/-1 until end of turn. {U}: Water Servant gets -1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "This creature has innate perceptiveness. It knows when to rise and when to vanish into the tides." —Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity

item.name: Assassinate
item.text: Destroy target tapped creature.
item.flavorText: "This is how wars are won—not with armies of soldiers but with a single knife blade, artfully placed." —Yurin, royal assassin

item.name: Barony Vampire
item.flavorText: "Poor little sun-dweller out past curfew. And to think, you might have survived if it wasn't so close to suppertime."

item.name: Black Knight
item.text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything white.)

item.name: Blood Tithe
item.text: Each opponent loses 3 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
item.flavorText: The Crimson Throne may be empty, but its coffers are full.

item.name: Bloodthrone Vampire
item.text: Sacrifice a creature: Bloodthrone Vampire gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The underclass often forget that they are not tenants, or servants, but property."

item.name: Bog Raiders
item.text: Swampwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
item.flavorText: Zombies are the perfect marshland fighters—they don't need to breathe and they don't care what they step in.

item.name: Captivating Vampire
item.text: Other Vampire creatures you control get +1/+1. Tap five untapped Vampires you control: Gain control of target creature. It becomes a Vampire in addition to its other types.

item.name: Child of Night
item.text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
item.flavorText: A vampire enacts vengeance on the entire world, claiming her debt two tiny pinpricks at a time.

item.name: Corrupt
item.text: Corrupt deals damage equal to the number of Swamps you control to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
item.flavorText: The power of the fens sleeps lightly, and always awakens hungry.

item.name: Dark Tutelage
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.
item.flavorText: "It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness." —Seneca, Epistles, trans. Gummere

item.name: Deathmark
item.text: Destroy target green or white creature.
item.flavorText: There are few ways to escape the deathmark: bargaining with a demon, washing in the fabled waters of youth, and of course, death.

item.name: Demon of Death's Gate
item.text: You may pay 6 life and sacrifice three black creatures rather than pay Demon of Death's Gate's mana cost. Flying, trample
item.flavorText: The locks on the cages of the damned are opened with keys of marrow, sinew, and blood.

item.name: Diabolic Tutor
item.text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: The wise always keep an ear open to the whispers of power.

item.name: Disentomb
item.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: The armies of the dead always report well rested.

item.name: Doom Blade
item.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
item.flavorText: The void is without substance but cuts like steel.

item.name: Duress
item.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
item.flavorText: "Don't worry. I'm not going to deprive you of all your secrets. Just your most precious one." —Liliana Vess

item.name: Grave Titan
item.text: Deathtouch Whenever Grave Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, put two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Death in form and function.

item.name: Gravedigger
item.text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: Only a thin layer of dirt separates civilization from an undead apocalypse.

item.name: Haunting Echoes
item.text: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard other than basic land cards. For each card exiled this way, search that player's library for all cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

item.name: Howling Banshee
item.text: Flying When Howling Banshee enters the battlefield, each player loses 3 life.
item.flavorText: Villagers cloaked the town in magical silence, but their ears still bled.

item.name: Leyline of the Void
item.text: If Leyline of the Void is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. If a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

item.name: Liliana Vess
item.text: +1: Target player discards a card. -2: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. -8: Put all creature cards in all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.

item.name: Liliana's Caress
item.text: Whenever an opponent discards a card, that player loses 2 life.
item.flavorText: "This might hurt less if you don't fight so hard. But I doubt it."

item.name: Liliana's Specter
item.text: Flying When Liliana's Specter enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
item.flavorText: "The finest minions know what I need without me ever saying a thing." —Liliana Vess

item.name: Mind Rot
item.text: Target player discards two cards.
item.flavorText: Not every thought is a good one.

item.name: Nantuko Shade
item.text: {B}: Nantuko Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: In life, the nantuko study nature by revering it. In death, they study nature by disemboweling it.

item.name: Necrotic Plague
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature." When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, its controller chooses target creature one of his or her opponents controls. Return Necrotic Plague from its owner's graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

item.name: Nether Horror
item.flavorText: "My dreams darkened and seeped into my waking hours. Spellcraft and nightmare merged to create this monstrosity." —Sunniva, witch of Holm Hollow

item.name: Nightwing Shade
item.text: Flying {1}{B}: Nightwing Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "There is one hour of the night even we do not watch." —Sedva, captain of the watch

item.name: Phylactery Lich
item.text: As Phylactery Lich enters the battlefield, put a phylactery counter on an artifact you control. Phylactery Lich is indestructible. When you control no permanents with phylactery counters on them, sacrifice Phylactery Lich.

item.name: Quag Sickness
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each Swamp you control.
item.flavorText: The dread gases didn't kill Farbid. But as he lay in the muck, miserable and helpless, watching ghouls and rats advance on him, he wished they had.

item.name: Reassembling Skeleton
item.text: {1}{B}: Return Reassembling Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
item.flavorText: Though you may see the same bones, you'll never see the same skeleton twice.

item.name: Relentless Rats
item.text: Relentless Rats gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield named Relentless Rats. A deck can have any number of cards named Relentless Rats.

item.name: Rise from the Grave
item.text: Put target creature card in a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.
item.flavorText: "Death is no excuse for disobedience." —Liliana Vess

item.name: Rotting Legion
item.text: Rotting Legion enters the battlefield tapped.
item.flavorText: Zombies have one speed: shamble.

item.name: Royal Assassin
item.text: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.
item.flavorText: An assassin is a king's most trusted courier, ensuring his messages are heard by even the most unwilling recipients.

item.name: Sign in Blood
item.text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
item.flavorText: Little agonies pave the way to greater power.

item.name: Stabbing Pain
item.text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Tap that creature.
item.flavorText: "You can take the fight out of nearly any creature if you know where its soft spot is." —Guttor, flesh-warper

item.name: Unholy Strength
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.
item.flavorText: "Born under the moon, the second child will stumble on temptation and seek power in the dark places of the heart." —Codex of the Constellari

item.name: Viscera Seer
item.text: Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
item.flavorText: In matters of life and death, he trusts his gut.

item.name: Act of Treason
item.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
item.flavorText: "Rage courses in every heart, yearning to betray its rational prison." —Sarkhan Vol

item.name: Ancient Hellkite
item.text: Flying {R}: Ancient Hellkite deals 1 damage to target creature defending player controls. Activate this ability only if Ancient Hellkite is attacking.
item.flavorText: When a dragon attacks, there are no bystanders.

item.name: Arc Runner
item.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Arc Runner.
item.flavorText: The storms of the wastelands form quickly and hit hard. Few have anything to do with rain.

item.name: Berserkers of Blood Ridge
item.text: Berserkers of Blood Ridge attacks each turn if able.
item.flavorText: They take a blood oath to die in battle. So far none have failed to fulfill the promise.

item.name: Bloodcrazed Goblin
item.text: Bloodcrazed Goblin can't attack unless an opponent has been dealt damage this turn.
item.flavorText: "A single drop of blood draws their attention, then they strip your bones clean before you have time to die." —Jamias, hermit of Telfer Peak

item.name: Canyon Minotaur
item.flavorText: "We'll scale these cliffs, traverse Brittle Bridge, and then fight our way down the volcanic slopes on the other side." "Isn't the shortest route through the canyon?" "Yes." "So shouldn't we—" "No."

item.name: Chandra Nalaar
item.text: +1: Chandra Nalaar deals 1 damage to target player. -X: Chandra Nalaar deals X damage to target creature. -8: Chandra Nalaar deals 10 damage to target player and each creature he or she controls.

item.name: Chandra's Outrage
item.text: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.
item.flavorText: "Her mind is an incredible mix of emotion and power. Even if I could grasp it, I couldn't hold it for long." —Jace Beleren, on Chandra Nalaar

item.name: Chandra's Spitfire
item.text: Flying Whenever an opponent is dealt noncombat damage, Chandra's Spitfire gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "I've lit most everything on fire—trees, rocks, even the water. Now it's time to burn the clouds."

item.name: Combust
item.text: Combust can't be countered by spells or abilities. Combust deals 5 damage to target white or blue creature. The damage can't be prevented.

item.name: Cyclops Gladiator
item.text: Whenever Cyclops Gladiator attacks, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature defending player controls. If you do, that creature deals damage equal to its power to Cyclops Gladiator.

item.name: Demolish
item.text: Destroy target artifact or land.

item.name: Destructive Force
item.text: Each player sacrifices five lands. Destructive Force deals 5 damage to each creature.
item.flavorText: The end of the world rarely comes quietly.

item.name: Earth Servant
item.text: Earth Servant gets +0/+1 for each Mountain you control.
item.flavorText: "Fire. Air. Water. These elements spread, filling in the spaces they are not. But earth is implacable like a sullen child." —Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity

item.name: Ember Hauler
item.text: {1}, Sacrifice Ember Hauler: Ember Hauler deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Flurk's crude goblin language didn't differentiate between "I bring the flame" and "I am the flame."

item.name: Fiery Hellhound
item.text: {R}: Fiery Hellhound gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "I had hoped to instill in it the loyalty of a guard dog, but with fire's power comes its unpredictability." —Maggath, Sardian elementalist

item.name: Fire Servant
item.text: If a red instant or sorcery spell you control would deal damage, it deals double that damage instead.
item.flavorText: "Elemental fire shimmers with rose hues and, unlike terrestrial blazes, smolders long after it's extinguished." —Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity

item.name: Fireball
item.text: Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players. Fireball costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.

item.name: Fling
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Fling, sacrifice a creature. Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Sometimes the cannoneer must become the cannonball.

item.name: Goblin Balloon Brigade
item.text: {R}: Goblin Balloon Brigade gains flying until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The enemy is getting too close! Quick! Inflate the toad!"

item.name: Goblin Chieftain
item.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) Other Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1 and have haste.
item.flavorText: "We are goblinkind, heirs to the mountain empires of chieftains past. Rest is death to us, and arson is our call to war."

item.name: Goblin Piker
item.flavorText: Once he'd worked out which end of the thing was sharp, he was promoted to guard duty.

item.name: Goblin Tunneler
item.text: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less is unblockable this turn.
item.flavorText: "You never know what's going to be in goblin tunnels. Even in the best case, there will still be goblins." —Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

item.name: Hoarding Dragon
item.text: Flying When Hoarding Dragon enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card, exile it, then shuffle your library. When Hoarding Dragon is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may put the exiled card into its owner's hand.

item.name: Incite
item.text: Target creature becomes red until end of turn and attacks this turn if able.
item.flavorText: The veneer of rationality peeled from the mage, revealing the spite and rage beneath.

item.name: Inferno Titan
item.text: {R}: Inferno Titan gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Whenever Inferno Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.

item.name: Lava Axe
item.text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player.
item.flavorText: From the heart of the mountain into the heart of the mage.

item.name: Leyline of Punishment
item.text: If Leyline of Punishment is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. Players can't gain life. Damage can't be prevented.

item.name: Lightning Bolt
item.text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

item.name: Magma Phoenix
item.text: Flying When Magma Phoenix is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to each creature and each player. {3}{R}{R}: Return Magma Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.

item.name: Manic Vandal
item.text: When Manic Vandal enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.
item.flavorText: It's fun. He doesn't need another reason.

item.name: Prodigal Pyromancer
item.text: {T}: Prodigal Pyromancer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "What am I looking at? Ashes, dead man."

item.name: Pyretic Ritual
item.text: Add {R}{R}{R} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: The Multiverse is filled with limitless power just waiting for someone to reach out and seize it.

item.name: Pyroclasm
item.text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.
item.flavorText: "Who'd want to ignite things one at a time?" —Chandra Nalaar

item.name: Reverberate
item.text: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
item.flavorText: "I'm not indecisive. I just don't like to limit my options." —Maxti, pyromancer

item.name: Shiv's Embrace
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying. {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.name: Thunder Strike
item.text: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
item.flavorText: Lightning reflexes, thunderous might.

item.name: Volcanic Strength
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has mountainwalk. (It's unblockable as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
item.flavorText: His blood boiled over, and he erupted with fists of stone.

item.name: Vulshok Berserker
item.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
item.flavorText: He will carve out a legend for himself with his own two hands.

item.name: Wild Evocation
item.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player reveals a card at random from his or her hand. If it's a land card, the player puts it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, the player casts it without paying its mana cost if able.

item.name: Acidic Slime
item.text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

item.name: Autumn's Veil
item.text: Spells you control can't be countered by blue or black spells this turn, and creatures you control can't be the targets of blue or black spells this turn.
item.flavorText: The rustling of leaves and a passing shadow are a dryad's only trace.

item.name: Awakener Druid
item.text: When Awakener Druid enters the battlefield, target Forest becomes a 4/5 green Treefolk creature for as long as Awakener Druid is on the battlefield. It's still a land.
item.flavorText: The druids of Mazar treat each seedcone with respect for the warrior it will become.

item.name: Back to Nature
item.text: Destroy all enchantments.
item.flavorText: "Nature is a mutable cloud which is always and never the same." —Ralph Waldo Emerson, Essays

item.name: Birds of Paradise
item.text: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "The gods used their feathers to paint all the colors of the world." —Yare-Tiva, warden of Gramur forest

item.name: Brindle Boar
item.text: Sacrifice Brindle Boar: You gain 4 life.
item.flavorText: The war lasted for generations. The boars didn't need to hunt for food anymore. They fed on the fallen corpses, and the living fed off of them.

item.name: Cudgel Troll
item.text: {G}: Regenerate Cudgel Troll. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

item.name: Cultivate
item.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

item.name: Dryad's Favor
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has forestwalk. (It's unblockable as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
item.flavorText: She grants knowledge of the ways to traverse the forest's invisible connections.

item.name: Duskdale Wurm
item.text: Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

item.name: Elvish Archdruid
item.text: Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool for each Elf you control.
item.flavorText: He knows the name of every elf born in the last four centuries. More importantly, they all know his.

item.name: Fauna Shaman
item.text: {G}, {T}, Discard a creature card: Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: She wears the talismans of every creature she can evoke.

item.name: Fog
item.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
item.flavorText: "I fear no army or beast, but only the morning fog. Our assault can survive everything else." —Lord Hilneth

item.name: Gaea's Revenge
item.text: Gaea's Revenge can't be countered. Haste Gaea's Revenge can't be the target of nongreen spells or abilities from nongreen sources.

item.name: Garruk Wildspeaker
item.text: +1: Untap two target lands. -1: Put a 3/3 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield. -4: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

item.name: Garruk's Companion
item.text: Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

item.name: Garruk's Packleader
item.text: Whenever another creature with power 3 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.
item.flavorText: "He has learned much in his long years. And unlike selfish humans, he's willing to share." —Garruk Wildspeaker

item.name: Giant Growth
item.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

item.name: Giant Spider
item.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
item.flavorText: The giant spider's silk naturally resists gravity, almost weaving itself as it blankets the forest canopy.

item.name: Greater Basilisk
item.text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
item.flavorText: Bone, stone . . . both taste the same to a hungry basilisk.

item.name: Hornet Sting
item.text: Hornet Sting deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: It was only then—to his infinite sorrow—that Gork realized hornets don't make honey.

item.name: Hunters' Feast
item.text: Any number of target players each gain 6 life.
item.flavorText: Those who kill a jawspur rhino must prepare spells to lift the carcass—even a dozen hunters can't lift its bulk.

item.name: Leyline of Vitality
item.text: If Leyline of Vitality is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. Creatures you control get +0/+1. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain 1 life.

item.name: Llanowar Elves
item.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot. —Llanowar penalty for trespassing

item.name: Mitotic Slime
item.text: When Mitotic Slime is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put two 2/2 green Ooze creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "When this creature is put into a graveyard, put two 1/1 green Ooze creature tokens onto the battlefield."

item.name: Naturalize
item.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
item.flavorText: "Nature does not need adornment." —Garruk Wildspeaker

item.name: Nature's Spiral
item.text: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. (A permanent card is an artifact, creature, enchantment, land, or planeswalker card.)
item.flavorText: Snail shell, fern, tornado—the world connects all things in form.

item.name: Obstinate Baloth
item.text: When Obstinate Baloth enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life. If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Obstinate Baloth, put it onto the battlefield instead of putting it into your graveyard.

item.name: Overwhelming Stampede
item.text: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control. (If a creature you control would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

item.name: Plummet
item.text: Destroy target creature with flying.
item.flavorText: "You are the grandest of all," said the archdruid to the trees. They became so proud of bark and branch that they suffered no creature to fly overhead or perch upon a bough.

item.name: Primal Cocoon
item.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature. When enchanted creature attacks or blocks, sacrifice Primal Cocoon.

item.name: Primeval Titan
item.text: Trample Whenever Primeval Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: When nature calls, run.

item.name: Prized Unicorn
item.text: All creatures able to block Prized Unicorn do so.
item.flavorText: "The desire for its magic horn inspires such bloodthirsty greed that all who see the unicorn will kill to possess it." —Dionus, elvish archdruid

item.name: Protean Hydra
item.text: Protean Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If damage would be dealt to Protean Hydra, prevent that damage and remove that many +1/+1 counters from it. Whenever a +1/+1 counter is removed from Protean Hydra, put two +1/+1 counters on it at the beginning of the next end step.

item.name: Runeclaw Bear
item.flavorText: "Nature has grown tired of the impositions of men and will begin to outfit its creations with tools for bloody instruction." —Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

item.name: Sacred Wolf
item.text: Sacred Wolf can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.
item.flavorText: "I raised my bow, and the wolf stared at me. Under its gaze, my finger would not release the string." —Aref the Hunter

item.name: Spined Wurm
item.flavorText: "They're as much like plants as animals. Leave them unchecked, and they'll choke out all other forms of life." —Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

item.name: Sylvan Ranger
item.text: When Sylvan Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: "Not all paths are found on the forest floor."

item.name: Wall of Vines
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
item.flavorText: Like all jungle plants, the vines must fight and claw for sunlight. Once their place is secured, they grow strong, sharp, and impenetrable.

item.name: Yavimaya Wurm
item.text: Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)
item.flavorText: Anywhere else, colossal. In the forests of Yavimaya, commonplace.

item.name: Angel's Feather
item.text: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: If taken, it cuts the hand that clutches it. If given, it heals the hand that holds it.

item.name: Brittle Effigy
item.text: {4}, {T}, Exile Brittle Effigy: Exile target creature.
item.flavorText: "In my early experiments in phylactery, I found that fragile forms have their uses." —Rocati, Duke of Martyne

item.name: Crystal Ball
item.text: {1}, {T}: Scry 2. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
item.flavorText: It glints with arcane truths to those who know how to glimpse them.

item.name: Demon's Horn
item.text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: Its curve mimics the twists of life and death.

item.name: Dragon's Claw
item.text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: "If there is a fire that never ceases to burn, it surely lies in the maw of a dragon." —Sarkhan Vol

item.name: Elixir of Immortality
item.text: {2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into your library.
item.flavorText: "Bottled life. Not as tasty as I'm used to, rather stale, but it has the same effect." —Baron Sengir

item.name: Gargoyle Sentinel
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {3}: Until end of turn, Gargoyle Sentinel loses defender and gains flying.
item.flavorText: "Do not mistake a quiet rampart for one that is unguarded. Some things stir only when they need to." —Bonovar, siege commander

item.name: Jinxed Idol
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Jinxed Idol deals 2 damage to you. Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent gains control of Jinxed Idol.
item.flavorText: "Please, honored friend, take it with my compliments. I insist."

item.name: Juggernaut
item.text: Juggernaut attacks each turn if able. Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.
item.flavorText: The mighty city of An Karras, with its rich history, built over thousands of years, fell in three hours.

item.name: Kraken's Eye
item.text: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: It's seen the wonders of entire worlds trapped in the depths of a bottomless ocean.

item.name: Ornithopter
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: Regardless of the century, plane, or species, developing artificers never fail to invent the ornithopter.

item.name: Platinum Angel
item.text: Flying You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.
item.flavorText: She is the apex of the artificer's craft, the spirit of the divine called out of base metal.

item.name: Sorcerer's Strongbox
item.text: {2}, {T}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, sacrifice Sorcerer's Strongbox and draw three cards.
item.flavorText: Simun the Quiet filled the chest with his most precious thoughts. But in a fit of paranoia, he locked up the memory of where he hid the key.

item.name: Steel Overseer
item.text: {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each artifact creature you control.
item.flavorText: "The world is already run by all manner of machines. One day, they'll remind us of that fact." —Sargis Haz, artificer

item.name: Stone Golem
item.flavorText: The sculptor, like most artists, put his heart and soul in his work. But the newly awakened golem decided he wanted his creator's other, more tangible parts.

item.name: Sword of Vengeance
item.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has first strike, vigilance, trample, and haste. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
item.flavorText: When wielded by a true believer, it matters little whether the sword is a relic or a replica.

item.name: Temple Bell
item.text: {T}: Each player draws a card.
item.flavorText: Enlightenment is not gained by striking the bell or hearing its toll. It's found in the silence that follows.

item.name: Triskelion
item.text: Triskelion enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Triskelion: Triskelion deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "Why do bad things always come in threes?" —Gisulf, expedition survivor

item.name: Voltaic Key
item.text: {1}, {T}: Untap target artifact.
item.flavorText: The missing piece to every puzzle.

item.name: Warlord's Axe
item.text: Equipped creature gets +3/+1. Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
item.flavorText: To split wood with it would be sacrilege. This tool has but one purpose, and that is war.

item.name: Whispersilk Cloak
item.text: Equipped creature is unblockable. Equipped creature has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.name: Wurm's Tooth
item.text: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: "The great wurm bit down on me. Instead of being crunched bloody, I slid into the space where its tooth was missing. One tooth—a boon most potent, indeed." —The Tall Tales of Oleander

item.name: Dragonskull Summit
item.text: Dragonskull Summit enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

item.name: Drowned Catacomb
item.text: Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

item.name: Glacial Fortress
item.text: Glacial Fortress enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or an Island. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

item.name: Mystifying Maze
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {4}, {T}: Exile target attacking creature an opponent controls. At the beginning of the next end step, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control.

item.name: Rootbound Crag
item.text: Rootbound Crag enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Forest. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

item.name: Sunpetal Grove
item.text: Sunpetal Grove enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or a Plains. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.

item.name: Terramorphic Expanse
item.text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forest
item.text: G
